CustomField.formula: if( text( Opportunity__r.Ware_House__r.City__c ) == 'Kolkata', 'PPLCU'+RIGHT(text(YEAR( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))), LEN(text(YEAR( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)))) - 2)+'SQT'+RIGHT( Name , LEN(Name) - 4),if( text(Opportunity__r.Ware_House__r.City__c) == 'Gurugram', 'PPLHO'+RIGHT(text(YEAR( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))), LEN(text(YEAR( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)))) - 2)+'SQT'+RIGHT( Name , LEN(Name) - 4),'Please select Sales From.'))
CustomField.label: Quote Number
